data.title: James Franco: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: James Franco: Check out the list of all James Franco movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest James Franco news on Times of India.
data.text:
James Franco cast as Fidel Castro in 'Alina Of Cuba'

PTI / Aug 05, 2022, 13:28 (IST)

Actor James Franco is set to essay the role of Cuban leader Fidel Castro in filmmaker Miguel Bardem's feature 'Alina of Cuba'. According to the reports, Imagen Award winner Mia Maestro has been roped in to play Natalia "Naty" Revuelta, the Cuban-born socialite Castro has a passionate love affair with.

James Franco returns to acting four years after sex-misconduct allegations

ANI / Jul 13, 2022, 13:06 (IST)

James Franco, who stepped away from acting following a series of allegations of sexual misconduct four years ago, is back in action. As per reports, Franco is all set to play one of the lead roles in Danish director Bille August's post-World War II coming-of-age drama Me, You, adapted from the novel 'Tu, Mia' by Erri De Luca.

Amber Heard's neighbour leaks her video of 'kissing' Cara Delevingne in ex-husband Johnny Depp's elevator - Watch

etimes.in / Jun 23, 2022, 20:34 (IST)

After videos of Amber Heard kissing Elon Musk and actor James Franco in the elevator of Johnny Depp's mansion while she was married to him, a new video of the 'Aquaman' actress kissing a woman in the elevator has surfaced online. According to the reports, the other woman in the question is actress Cara Delevingne. However, it is not yet clear if the episode took place while the actress was married to Depp or after they got separated.

Amber Heard on Johnny Depp: This is the man who tried to kill me

IANS / May 18, 2022, 13:02 (IST)

Actress Amber Heard completed her testimony after four days on the witness stand, defending herself from accusations that she had faked her abuse claims against former husband Johnny Depp.

Johnny Depp calls Amber Heard accusations 'heinous and disturbing'; says he never struck ex-wife, nor any other woman in his life

Reuters / Apr 20, 2022, 08:37 (IST)

Actor Johnny Depp testified on Tuesday that he never struck his ex-wife Amber Heard and was challenging her accusations in a $50 million defamation case to correct the public's perception and stand up for his children.

Amber Heard's ex-assistant alleges actress's claims of physical abuse are false

IANS / Apr 16, 2022, 12:53 (IST)

The ongoing legal battle between 'Pirates of the Caribbean' star Johnny Depp and his ex-wife Amber Heard has taken an interesting turn as Heard's former assistant Kate James, has testified against her boss's claims of physical abuse at the hands of Depp in the court, reports a news agency.

Johnny Depp became 'monster' on drugs and alcohol, Amber Heard's lawyers tell court

AFP / Apr 13, 2022, 07:13 (IST)

"Pirates of the Caribbean" star Johnny Depp physically and sexually abused his then-wife Amber Heard during drug- and alcohol-fueled binges in which he became a "monster," her lawyers told a court on Tuesday.

Johnny Depp, ex-wife Amber Heard head to US court for defamation case on allegations of spousal abuse

AFP / Apr 11, 2022, 07:15 (IST)

After a high-profile libel case in London, actor Johnny Depp and his ex-wife Amber Heard are headed back to court Monday, this time in the United States, for a blockbuster defamation case revolving around allegations of spousal abuse.

Actor James Franco admits to sexual misconduct allegations, says, 'I did sleep with students'

PTI / Dec 23, 2021, 17:00 (IST)

Nearly four years after he was accused of sexually inappropriate behavior, actor-writer James Franco has broken his silence admitting to the claims he denied initially, saying it was "wrong" to sleep with the students. The Oscar nominee, known for films like Sam Raimi's 'Spider-Man' series, 'Pineapple Express' and 'The Interview', also revealed he has struggled with sex addiction for years after becoming sober from alcohol at a young age.

Ronny C: I'm keen on working with Tara Sutaria and Alia Bhatt

TNN / May 13, 2021, 10:23 (IST)

It is speculated that the former footballer is about to sign a contract with one of the biggest production houses in the country and his debut film is all set to hit theatres in 2022.
